pattern_description: Time order does not match claims
example_scenario: Witness says event at 20:10 but log shows 19:55
clarifying_questions: Can you confirm what you used to check the time?
resolution_paths: Reconcile with anchor evidence or adjust reliability

example_scenario: Subject claims to be outside but door log shows entry
clarifying_questions: Where were you just before this moment?
resolution_paths: Confirm movement path; resolve via timeline

example_scenario: Person claims to move a heavy crate alone
clarifying_questions: How did you attempt this action?

example_scenario: Claims to be in cafeteria but camera shows corridor
Object falls before trigger action
resolution_paths: separate unrelated events; isolate true cause

example_scenario: Witness claims to lock door after leaving but footage shows door already locked
clarifying_questions: Do you recall hearing the lock click?
resolution_paths: Align timeline and check habitual behavior

example_scenario: Subject says bag was on chair but photo shows it on floor
clarifying_questions: Did anyone else handle your bag?

example_scenario: Person says they avoided argument yet video shows them approaching loudly
clarifying_questions: What were you feeling at that moment?

example_scenario: One witness heard shouting; another claims silence
clarifying_questions: Where were you standing relative to the event?

example_scenario: Claims 'I never touched that device' but fingerprints found
clarifying_questions: Have you handled similar devices earlier?

example_scenario: Witness says it was raining heavily but forecast shows clear skies
clarifying_questions: Are you sure it was this day?

example_scenario: Subject insists conversation lasted 10 minutes but audio is 2 minutes
clarifying_questions: Did it feel fast or slow to you?

example_scenario: Claims to run across hall in 5 seconds yet footage shows 12 seconds
Claims not to know object but earlier message references it
Person says they 'barely touched it' but object shows strong marks
clarifying_questions: Can you show how you touched it?

example_scenario: Claims to be on call but device logs show no calls
clarifying_questions: Do you recall who you intended to call?

example_scenario: Witness followed oven timer though actual timeline used wall clock
Says they were near the counter but shadows show them far
clarifying_questions: What objects were closest to you?

example_scenario: Claims to pick a complex lock quickly despite no experience
Says alarm sounded after window broke but sensors show alarm preceded break
clarifying_questions: Which sound did you recognize first?

example_scenario: Friend claims presence but logs show friend absent
clarifying_questions: When did you last see each other?

example_scenario: Claims two events were simultaneous but noise logs show gap
clarifying_questions: Were you focusing on anything else?

example_scenario: Says there were three boxes but photo shows four
clarifying_questions: Did you check behind the stack?

example_scenario: Claims to be observer but appears active in footage
clarifying_questions: What role did you think you had?

example_scenario: Light flickered before switch was touched
Subject claims to arrive in 2 minutes but distance requires 10
Says facing north but shadow suggests south
clarifying_questions: What landmark were you looking at?

example_scenario: Witness insists event was Tuesday but logs show Wednesday
clarifying_questions: What did you do earlier that day?

example_scenario: Claims to carry crate upstairs without rest but sensor shows pauses
clarifying_questions: Did you stop at any point?

example_scenario: Says they used screwdriver but tool marks match pliers
Claims to follow steps exactly but error logs show deviation
Claims events were close but logs show long gap
Says room was silent but recorder shows loud fan
clarifying_questions: Did you notice any background sounds?

example_scenario: Claims item was intact but photo shows dent
clarifying_questions: When did you last examine it?

example_scenario: Witness mixes two people wearing similar jackets
Believes spilled drink caused slip but floor was dry
Witness gives timestamps that overlap impossibly
clarifying_questions: Can you walk me through your steps?

example_scenario: Claims entering via front door though it was locked
clarifying_questions: Which door did you approach first?

example_scenario: Says assembling item was easy but video shows struggle
Claims to avoid attention but wore bright clothing
Says discussion happened after departure but logs show before
clarifying_questions: What happened immediately after you arrived?

example_scenario: Claims running at top speed yet performance slower than average
Says key was gone but picture shows it on table
Assumes noise caused fear but fear began earlier
Claims continuous presence but sensors show intermittent absence
Claims to reach counter in 1 step but layout shows 4 steps
Claims to be in meeting but also running errand same time
Says room was dark but camera shows ceiling lights on
Claims to lift box easily but strain visible
Claims not to open drawer but fingerprints inside
Claims wearing blue shirt but footage shows grey
clarifying_questions: Where did you see your reflection last?

example_scenario: Believes loud bang caused fall but fall began before bang
clarifying_questions: Which did you react to first?

example_scenario: Describes café details that don't match décor
Claims to stand inside booth but angle shows outside
clarifying_questions: What surface were you leaning on?

example_scenario: Says moment felt very long despite short duration
Claims to complete puzzle in seconds but average needs minutes
Witness says strong smell but others smelled nothing
clarifying_questions: Have you been sensitive to smells before?

example_scenario: Says lamp was upright but photo shows tilted
Claims stranger present but matches known colleague
clarifying_questions: What stood out about their appearance?

example_scenario: Claims to hack device quickly but no logs of access
Claims to be home at 18:00 but transit card shows travel
clarifying_questions: Did you make any short stops?

example_scenario: Claims shortest path taken but GPS shows detour
Says 'around 6' but actual is 5:40
clarifying_questions: Did you check the time exactly?

example_scenario: Thinks alarm triggered by wind though sensors show manual push
clarifying_questions: Did you notice anyone near alarm?

example_scenario: Claims object isn't theirs but bag contains matching items
Claims to read message then speak, but video shows speaking first
Claims calm but trembling visible
Claims call was with friend but voice sample differs
Claims on second floor but elevator logs show ground
clarifying_questions: Did you use stairs or elevator?

example_scenario: Uses phone time but phone unsynced
Claims to dodge falling item but video shows slow reaction
Says box was rectangular but image shows square
clarifying_questions: Did you view it from an angle?

example_scenario: Claims group presence but two deny being there
Believes comment offended person but expression shows confusion instead
Claims no hat worn but hat visible in reflection
clarifying_questions: Did you pick it up automatically?

example_scenario: Claims walking north but GPS shows south
clarifying_questions: What landmark did you head toward?

example_scenario: Claims 'everything happened quickly' but logs show gradual steps
Claims not hearing alarm though it was loud
clarifying_questions: Were you focused on something else?

example_scenario: Says item pristine but scratch visible
Claims to jog nonstop but tracker shows stops
Claims to be two places close together but impossible distance
clarifying_questions: Which event do you recall first?

example_scenario: Claims outside but ambient audio shows indoor acoustics
Claims noise happened after door opened but mic shows before
Claims to jump high barrier but height disproves
Says object was light but marks show deep impression
Believes flicker caused alarm but logs show manual press
clarifying_questions: Did you see anyone near the alarm?

example_scenario: Claims used left hand but smudge aligns with right-hand action
clarifying_questions: Which hand do you usually use?

example_scenario: Gives precise details that contradict photos
clarifying_questions: How certain are you about those details?

example_scenario: Claims clear path but layout shows obstruction
Thinks two noises were same event but timestamps differ
Claims room was cold but thermostat shows warm
Says bag was black but photo shows navy
clarifying_questions: Where were you viewing it from?

example_scenario: Claims rapid typing but keystroke logs slow
Believes spill caused malfunction but malfunction preceded spill
Claims event at 18:00 but city bells heard at 19:00
clarifying_questions: What made you think it was 18:00?

example_scenario: Claims on balcony but railing angle shows below
Claims immediate response but logs show long delay
Counts 6 items but inventory shows 5
Says to help clean but seen walking away
Claims to act quietly but recorder shows loud noises
clarifying_questions: What surface were you working on?

example_scenario: Believes slide caused fall but friction too high
Claims staying whole evening but badge logs show early exit
